description: Demolition and removal of existing internal cremator equipment, external mercury abatement equipment, the enclosure and associated flues and pipe work. Installation of new cremator equipment to the rear of the existing building, within a new enclosure and internal reconfiguration of the existing crematorium building to account for variations to equipment locations
